title: Scryed, Book 5
description: After uncovering HOLY's plot to create an army of Alters to take over the Lost Ground, battle lines become more clear as former HOLY officers begin to side with the rebellion. In all of the hurly burly, Ryuhou, who joined HOLY to hunt down Alters because of his mother's murder at the hands of one, learns the truth behind his mother's death. With the truth out, he joins Kazuma in an attack on Martin Zigmar only to discover that yet another more powerful Alter awaits, capable of controlling space, matter, and time
author: Yosuke Kuroda
